title: 12/10/20 HOUR 1- Ron Rivera
itunes:title: 12/10/20 HOUR 1- Ron Rivera
description:
Ron Rivera tells Dan that when he saw the blood on Alex Smith; the first thing he wanted to see was which leg it was that was injured.
